title: run rust binding demo error
body:
## Description

Darwin luxdeMacBook-Pro.local 22.1.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.1.0: Mon Aug 15 20:06:40 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8792.40.29.161.2~1/RELEASE_ARM64_T8103 arm64

author: xunfeng1980

comments.body:
Hi @xunfeng1980 

According to your error msg `error[E0425]: cannot find function, tuple struct or tuple variant WasmEdge_CompilerCompileFromBuffer in module ffi`, it looks like your wasmedge library version is not updated to the latest one. This API is added in the 0.11.0 release. Please check that you have updated the wasmedge version. Thanks.
